title: Pet population in Europe 2018 , by animal type
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of pets in thousands for 6 number of Pet Types.
The maximum Number of pets in thousands 103828.0 is found at Pet Type Cat and the minimum is found at Reptiles where Number of pets in thousands is 7848.0.
There is a difference of 95980.0 between the maximum Pet Type Cat and minimum Pet Type Reptiles.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of pets in thousands for 6 number of Pet Types.
Pet Type Cat has the highest Number of pets in thousands and Reptiles has the lowest Number of pets in thousands.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of pets in thousands for 6 number of Pet Types.

max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Pet Type, and Number of pets in thousands in each Pet Type on the y axis.
The Number of pets in thousands is highest at Pet Type Cat and lowest at Pet Type Reptiles.
There is a difference of 95980.0 between the maximum Pet Type Cat and minimum Pet Type Reptiles.
Number of pets in thousands at Pet Type Cat is 103828.0 , second place is  at 103828.0, and thirdly is Ornamental bird at 50212.0.
The Pet Type Cat has 2.15 times more Number of pets in thousands than average.
Summing up the values of all Pet Types, we get total 289359.0.
